Villa for Sale

Listed on June 4, 2018November 26, 2018
For sale Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms 1

2BHK Fully furnished field View Villa in a gated property in the heart of the village, Assagao. The ground floor consists of the Dinning room and common Sitting area, Kitchen and a powder room. On the 2nd floor we get both the bedrooms with Balconies with attached bathrooms. Common swimming pool in the complex.
